title: Scripture
author: Scripture
content: Are you interested to attend events/seminars regarding cryptocurrency?You might see interesting events on this thread. I will update this from time to time and post here paid/free events for your reference.Philippines continues to grow, and many shows their interest to spread awareness about cryptocurrency. This is a good opportunity for us to learn more and be familiar with cryptocurrency. Kudos to those companies/individuals for their initiatives and effort to make events as much as possible.NOVEMBER (2022) EVENTS Nov 11 - 13 - Web3 Hackaton PH Festival/Web3 Builders Dinner/Nov 14 - 18 - Philippine Web3 FestivalNov 14 - Bicol Blockchain ConferenceNov 28 - Dec 04 - Philippine Blockchain WeekSource: https://bitpinas.com/events/Disclaimer: This is not an affiliation link, will only share the date of the events. Will try to improve this thread and include fees or other details about the events.

comments.author: samcrypto
comments.body: Ok ang thread na ito, to give updates para sa mga paganap in crypto space.Though mas ok siguro to provide links for the seminars or events para mas madali makapagregister kase yung iba dito, ay pabilisin talaga makareserve especially yung mga free events. Ok den to input the rate para at least aware ang nakakarami kung afford ba nila or hinde. If may online events den sana mas ok.

comments.author: crzy
comments.body: Yes tama mas ok ilagay yung link at fees kung magkano para makaattend yung iba.Marame na mga events ngayon since allowed na ulit and panigurado dumarami na ren ang nagkakainterest para dito kase yung iba, nahahatak na ng mga kaibigan nila sa cryptoworld. Gusto ko ren makaattend sa mga ganito kaya lang medyo pricey lang talaga yung ibang events and if free naman, mabilis nga magkaubusan.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Most of the events ngayon ay related sa Web3, masaya sana umattend kaya lang weekdays yung mga events at medyo pricey ren sya. Meron ba dito na nakaattend na sa mga events before? Iâ€™m curious if they encourage you to invest ba or just an event that discuss more information about crypto and blockchain, natatakot kase ako baka mapilit ako maginvest.
